channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Red C for The Sunday Business Post, 21–28 March 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Fine Gael (EPP): 28.1–33.8%
  • Fianna Fáil (ALDE): 22.3–27.7%
  • Sinn Féin (GUE/NGL): 11.1–15.2%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 3.8–6.5%
  • Solidarity–People Before Profit (GUE/NGL): 1.3–3.1%
  • Social Democrats (*): 2.1–4.3%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 2.1–4.3%
  • Renua Ireland (*): 0.1–0.7%
  • Independent Alliance (*): 2.1–4.3%
  • Independents (*): 10.4–14.5%
